name: Widilo
slogan: We connect leading e-commerce brands with savvy online shoppers
description:
Our main mission is to provide online buyers with the best offers and voucher codes valid at their favourite merchants. We aim to increase the purchase power of online buyers. Every month, millions of online shoppers use our solutions to get the best discount codes or help before they buy anything online.

Widilo is the most rewarding cashback and voucher website. With Widilo, online shoppers can find voucher codes and earn cashback at their favourite online stores in one place when shopping online. 

​On top of all the amazing cashback, discount codes and promotions, Widilo allows members to benefit from extra shopping points when cashback is activated. Once members have earned points, they can redeem them via the Widilo shop towards gift cards and products.

jobs.title: Content Manager USA
jobs.description:
Widilo is #1 cashback destination in France. With Widilo, members can cashback and discount codes at over 2,500 stores when shopping online. Our main mission is to provide online buyers with the best offers and voucher codes valid at their favorite merchants. We aim to increase the purchase power of online buyers.

We partner with premium medias and publishers in France and throughout Europe such as Le Figaro, L’Equipe, 20 Minutes, El Mundo and DH. Every month, millions of online shoppers use our solutions to get the best discount codes or help before they buy anything online.

MISSIONS

Within Widilo, your mission will be to:
‣ Ensure the development of traffic and audience online
‣ Maintain the coherence, attractiveness and fluidity of the content of the entire site
‣ Write, publish, manage and distribute search engine optimized content.
‣ Follow a predefined SEO strategy in order to acquire new users
‣ Working closely with account managers to help create engaging marketing campaigns
With a 5-year university degree or business school, you are rigorous, dynamic, flexible and curious.

PROFILE & SKILLS

‣ Native english
‣ 2+ years of experience in a similar position
‣ Excellent web culture, passionate about digital and e-commerce
‣ Control of communication channels & omnichannel approach
‣ You want to benefit from a high degree of autonomy and have a real impact on the
business
‣ You know how to work in a team but also independently
